author: alja
body:
- draw un-uniform shapes with boxes to represent ecal EB and EE energy deposit in detail views for:
  - Electron
  - Photon
  - Candidate
  - Muon
  - CaloTower
  - TrackBase

- remove color manager printout
title: 80x Fireworks: new version of ECAL detail view
